This project is a modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 15 (App Router), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Lucide Icons, and shadcn/ui. It includes dark mode, SEO meta tags, and animated, mobile-first UI components for portfolio, skills, projects, experience, and contact sections. All code is in TypeScript and follows the Next.js 15 App Router structure.
